title: Unveiling Earth's Secrets with AI: Our Undergraduate Benjamin Lands Oslo Internship
short_description: This upcoming August, Benjamin Mellon and fellow undergraduate at MSU, Aardarsh Swaminathan, will intern in Oslo, Norway under Dr. John Aiken.The interns will apply modern AI tools to identify acoustic events occuring in a combined hydrophone and geophone data set acquired in the Oman Drilling Project's Multiborehole observatory.

content.1_para: This upcoming August, Benjamin Mellon and fellow undergraduate at MSU, Aardarsh Swaminathan, will intern in Oslo, Norway under Dr. John Aiken.
content.2_para: The interns will apply modern AI tools to identify acoustic events occuring in a combined hydrophone and geophone data set acquired in the Oman Drilling Project's Multiborehole observatory.
content.3_para: The students will use a neural network to classify physical occurences for later classification based on limited validation data.
content.4_para: The interns are enthusiastic to use cutting edge computing resources to collaboratively devolope AI software solutions for a geophyscal problem.
